website_summaries.verdict: With its strong build, ample storage, and full HD display, the Dell Inspiron 15 7000 Series (7559) is an excellent entry-level gaming laptop that delivers better performance than you'd expect for the price.
cons: Speakers are tinny at the highest volume

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for gaming. If you are looking for gaming and mobility it is highly recommended. It is probably worth buying a cooling pad just in case. I have to clarify though that I had no overheating problems. Ran Fallout 4 and other great games on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easily expansible. I use an external monitor with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 2 years ago and still works perfectly. It is always so silent even when gaming. It is easily expansible. I use an external monitor with it and fps on games is still flawless. The only issue I have with it (and many other buyers of this laptop) is the left corner pops up where the charging port is. The plastic falls apart and you have to open the laptop and screw the loose screw back in its place. I do this monthly as dells warranty specifically doesn't cover this. I wonder why 🤔🤔 Overall great laptop, even if it has its quirks.
customer_reviews.author: IDontBelieveInGingers

customer_reviews.title: Decent gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's a good all round gaming laptop! If your buying it for streaming, don t waste your money, just get a desktop
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop with very reasonable specification for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased through IHI and delivery was within three days! Great laptop with very reasonable specification for the price. There was a bit of confusion regarding HDD/SSD but IHI resolved the matter super quickly, sending me a SSD within another 3 days. Would highly recommend this laptop for mid range gaming purposes and quality speakers for movies.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Payton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice very fast slick laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very nice very fast slick laptop....for me the opportunity to easily uprate the RAM and harddrive was the important thing ....the machine was very fast straight from the box no problems at all to talk of...a good computer with the added bonus of future proofing..recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value with great features. Ideal in lecture halls in UNI as keypad illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnydaises

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop for price - runs everything u want - ...
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop for price - runs everything u want - warframe, csgo, dota, Overwatch etc. I have had some problems with the speakers, but the speakers are not that important. Also is a fingerprint magnet.Also is impossible to game on when not plugged in - 30fps cap on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Had it about 6months now and I am very happy with my product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop for its price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop for its price. Would recommend strongly to buy it from Coryell solutions. Arrived in 4-5 days from USA to Ireland. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So basically I am quite satisfied with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop about 2 months ago. I had problems with the WiFi but when I updated the adapter driver the problem stopped. I had problems with some games but I upgraded windows 10 and all the games are working now. So basically I am quite satisfied with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Revesz

customer_reviews.title: so good.. drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: So far..so good..drawbacks ..no disk drive..and windows 10 with microsoft edge..
customer_reviews.author: Polymorph

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt recognize the NVIDIA graphics card
customer_reviews.text: Its a good laptop and it works great however a few months ago i had an update for my NVIDIA graphics card and it said that the computer did not recognise or did not posses the appropriate hardware for the update (the NVIDIA graphics) i found a temporary solution however everytime there is an update to the driver i have to repeat this long and boring process in order for the computer to recognize the graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Added another 250gb SSD for a Steam ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Added another 250gb SSD for a Steam Library (took 30 second). Good quality build and has thrown everything I've thrown at it gaming wise.
customer_reviews.author: AJE

customer_reviews.title: not so great as expected but still satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop for four days now, I have played cod9, bioshock infinit,gta5 all on1080 with all high settings. Cod and bioshock runs very smoothly.However , when running gta5, fps is not as high as 60 as I saw from others reviews.It's about 45 to 50fps But that doesnt hurt much because the game still runs smoothly with this fps. Sound of it is not loud and everything is good so far. If u want a buddget gaming laptop, this one is good on 1080p games. Anyway , worth for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this laptop it works fine for the first month then it starts crashing and lagging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 11/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop, very powerful, had no problems. Connect an Ethernet cable before you turn it on so that it starts installing all important updates immediately - this cleared all problems people seem to be having including wifi and graphics issues. Plays most current gen games at max graphics, doesn't overheat though the fans can get quite loud! Excellent display but has light bleed on the edges of the screen - only noticeable on start up, lowering screen brightness helps. Would highly recommend this laptop to the budding gamer or 3D modelling artist. For the price it's a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
